title: PMS 2.0 574 - JJ Watt Officially Activated in Arionza, NFL Week 18 Preview, Preston Smith, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about the new reports coming out from the Antonio Brown situation in Tampa Bay and all the drama and fallout that is following that and the Bucs as they begin their quest to repeat, the news that JJ Watt has officially been activated in Arizona and will be back for the Cardinals for the playoffs, and they go through the entire week 18 NFL slate and make their picks against the spread and look at the different playoff scenarios. Joining the program is Outside Linebacker for Green Bay Packers, Preston Smith to chat about how the defense has evolved over the course of the season, what it's like playing with and against a guy like Aaron Rodgers, how much playing time he thinks he'll get this weekend against the Lions and what their schedule is like as we move into the playoffs, who the funniest person in the locker room is, the impact guys like Rasul Douglas and De'Vondre Campbell have made this year, and much more (1:16:27-1:34:35). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
